summary: Actors, Sets ... etc. for Christians who want to make Christian Movies in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5] Christian Skyrim Movie Makers Tools[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

by stormshallow, [b]SCWatchman[/b] ([url=#]email[/url]: watchid910@gmail.com)

[b][color=#ff0000]
WARNING: If you are offended, simply by the fact that someone else expresses their beliefs then you are the one who is immature, please go somewhere else and don't make yourself and everyone else miserable. I'm not forcing this mod on anyone.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]
NOTE: The content included in this mod is not intended to reflect any religious views on the part of Bethesda Softworks, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, or the Nexus community. This is a historical mod built with Skyrim tools by stormshallow.[/color][/b]

RATED: M
For MATURE audiences ONLY, due to what was done to Jesus.If you are playing Elder Scrolls, and are interested in this mod I would assume that you know this already and can handle the content.

Requirements:
Requires official Skyrim.esm and always be sure to have the newest Update.esm This Mod should stand on its own withoutDawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn.

------------------------------------------------------
[size=3] Hello Fellow Movie Makers:[/size]
------------------------------------------------------

Since I [url=#]started[/url] modding Skyrim, I've been wanting to make a Christian movie of the [url=#]story[/url] of Jesus with it, but my computer is a laptop so I can't really film much of anything in Skyrim.

I [url=#]started[/url] working on this mod before I built my “[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29524/?]TTOA: The Tombs Of Anak[/url]” mod, but after putting countless hours, (the year before last), into designing the environments, actors and programing of the events, (for the player to follow along and watch [url=#]play[/url] out), the whole thing crashed, so I moved on to TTOA.

I've now been mostly off of the Nexus and Skyrim for almost a year now, but am [url=#]starting[/url] again. I'd now like to help Christian movie makers by providing Actors and Sets.

If your Christian productions are good and/or reflect the Gospel well, I'd also like to post them on this page, so please send me your links.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
 If this mod and the information included is helpful to you, let me know and if you have any suggestions as to other things that could add to this concept, please let me know.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3] The Files that I [url=#]plan[/url] to be posting are:[/size]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ACTORS:
(this file includes over 50 Actors for the [url=#]death[/url] burial and resurrection of Jesus)
[[[The mod will probably not be [url=#]finished[/url] at the first posting, I still have work to do.]]]

The following mods were used to design some of the costumes:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51682/?] Ashara Imperial Outfit - UNP - 7B - Sundracon by SydneyB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era by Jedo Dre and the team[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43293/?]Ghosu - Helmets _ Bone Shield and Tribal Staff by Ghosu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3733/?]JoO Jedi Robe by JackoO[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16886/?] Friendly Guard Helmets by FurArmor[/url]

[[I wanted to Thank RGMage2 again for teaching me how to make the Crown of Thorns.]]

SETS:
(this file will include Sets for the death burial and resurrection of Jesus)
[[[I am not very good at designing sets. If anyone wishes to help, I'd rather just link to your mod, otherwise this will take longer.]]]

-------------------------------------
[size=3] WHAT I STILL NEED:[/size]
-------------------------------------

A Crucifixion Animation:

All that I need is the lower animation of the DA02_BoethiahPostIdle.hkx combined with the upper animation of the MT_Shackled_01.hkx

Understand that Roman Crucifixion was not done like a classic Catholic Crucifix.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59591-5-1419966029.jpg[/img]

There were no ropes to hold Jesus' arms and no stand for his feet to rest on. He was nailed through the bones between His wrist and palm and through the side of his foot, where it is also the heel.

“And I will put enmity between thee and the [url=#]woman[/url], and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise his heel.” -Genesis 3:15

“For [url=#]dogs[/url] have compassed me: the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me: they pierced my hands and my feet.” -Psalm 22:16

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3] How to use this Mod: (Installation)[/size]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

First, put the .ESP, .BLS, and .BSA files in your Data folder (should be “Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data” or something like that).

Next, I built this mod so that it will not interfere with anything in your game.

Everything in the mod starts with “000Actor” in the Creation Kit [None of the Actors are at a location in Skyrim.]

The way that you get the Actors into the [url=#]game[/url] is through the console.

So bring up your console (usually type “~”).
Next type “help actor” and hit “Enter”.
At this point you should see a [url=#]complete[/url] list of all the NPC actors, (there names all begin with “Actor”). You probably will need to scroll up and down with “Pg Up” & “Pg Dn” keys.
When you find the NPC that you want to use as your actor, type “player.placeatme <id number>” (followed by a number if you want more than 1) and hit “Enter”.
The actor will appear, (probably behind you). Repeat the process again until you have all the actors you want and then hit “~” again to turn off the console.
Each of the actors is set up to be a follower so it should be easier to place them where you want. :)

(UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhall is highly recommended as you can only have 1 actor at a time if you do not use it.)

Uninstall is the same as Install, you just delete the .ESP, .BLS, and .BSA files.


------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3] Mods for Movie Making and Directing Actors:
[/size]------------------------------------------------------------------------


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56857/?]Skyrim Video Making Guide by ndh[/url](Lots of good tips & mods)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10870/?]Puppeteer Master by JohnB[/url](character animation tool)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10431/?]Directors Tools by Artisanix[/url](change weather, add effects and animations to characters, and much more)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36047/?]Alternate Actors by Iceburg[/url](allows you to switch your PC for any NPC in game and edit them)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhall by Original – fLokii – Recent updates - Vamyan[/url](makes it possible to have more followers)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57589/?]Mixed Unit Tactics by flexcreator[/url](allows you to direct groups of people)

[b]This is for majorly dedicated movie makers:
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9718/?]3D Vision Complete Compatibility Project by chizow with HeliX Mod[/url](maybe this could be used for filming in 3D, I don't know)

A Skyrim Modding Tutorial:
[url=https://www.academia.edu/10887563/Modding_Skyrim]Modding Skyrim[/url]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3] Helpful Console Commands for Movie Makers:
[/size]-------------------------------------------------------------------------


tfc - toggle floating camera on/off (i.e. disconnect camera from your character)
sucsm <number> speed of free – flying camera Default 10
sgtm <number> world speed Default 20 (20 minutes per minute)
showracemenu - for editing your characters
tm – toggle menu (HUD) on/off (note console commands and menus must be done blind as long as this is on)
 tc - toggle camera, for filming from different actors
animcam – reset camera position F to lock & unlock

-------------------------------------------
[size=3] My Youtube Channels:[/size]
-------------------------------------------

If you are [url=#]interested[/url], I also have a couple of Youtube channels that may inspire you further:

[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/SCWatchman]SCWatchman[/url]

[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/FHProdutions]FHProdutions[/url]

--------------------------
[size=3] Final Note:[/size]
--------------------------

Finally, may God Bless, Inspire, and Guide your efforts to preach the Gospel via the instrument of film.

Love IN Jesus,
-stormshallow, [b]SCWatchman
[/b]
author: SCWatchman
